title: Weekly Digest (12 July, 2020 - 19 July, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 31 issues were created.
Of these, 15 issues have been closed and 16 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10971 [Add e2e test for PN](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10971), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10970 [Fix images issues](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10970), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10969 [Replace account cards in wallet with account list layout](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10969), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10968 [Crash on IOS after adding access to photos in case of heavy images (>10 MB)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10968), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10967 [Fix backup seed pharse ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10967), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10966 [Allow nested touchable in list item](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10966), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10965 ["Next" button is enabled when passwords don't match or have less then 6 chars on "Create password" screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10965), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10964 [Display issues in "Back up your seed phrase" flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10964), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10963 [Remove PUK from onboarding (new user experience)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10963), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10961 [Bridged bot](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10961), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10957 [Manage assets view lags on scrolls ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10957), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10955 [[#10195] Delete multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10955), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #10953 [Mentions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10953), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #10952 [fix/tutorial-link](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10952), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:green_heart: #10947 [Add information for referrers of referral program](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10947), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10941 [Dependabot couldn't find a package.json for this project](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10941), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10962 [[New e2e] e2e for contact view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10962), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10960 [nix: fix conditional that selects .env.e2e for ABI=x86 builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10960), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10959 [[#10914] Show proper username in chat on opening from background](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10959), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10958 [[#10928] Always show blocked users](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10958), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10956 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10956), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:heart: #10954 [Revert "upgrade shadow"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10954), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #10951 [Don't re-open bottom sheet if now closing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10951), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10950 [Disable by default list item animations on android](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10950), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10949 [Fix password position in wallet new account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10949), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10948 [Fix missing i18n](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10948), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10946 [[New e2e] separate keystore](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10946), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10945 ['Text strings must be rendered within a <Text> component' when tap on KDO (KudosToken) from collectibles](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10945), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10944 [[WIP] Start scroll from 25% of page height](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10944), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10943 [Chat headers are messed up after opening app from background on IOS and navigating to 1-1 chat and back](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10943), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10942 [After leaving group chat bottom sheet is not closed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10942), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10970 [Fix images issues](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10970), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
It received :+1: x0, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x4.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10968 [Crash on IOS after adding access to photos in case of heavy images (>10 MB)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10968), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
It received 12 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 28 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 12 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10971 [Add e2e test for PN](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10971), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:yellow_heart: #10970 [Fix images issues](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10970), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10967 [Fix backup seed pharse ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10967), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10966 [Allow nested touchable in list item](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10966), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10955 [[#10195] Delete multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10955), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #10953 [Mentions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10953), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #10952 [fix/tutorial-link](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10952), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:yellow_heart: #10935 [[WIP] ios pn](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10935), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10912 [WIP: Add reactions picker UI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10912), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10873 [New UI for chat input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10873), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10810 [audio messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10810), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #10620 [WIP Add referral share link ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10620), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 16 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10962 [[New e2e] e2e for contact view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10962), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #10960 [nix: fix conditional that selects .env.e2e for ABI=x86 builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10960), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10959 [[#10914] Show proper username in chat on opening from background](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10959), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10958 [[#10928] Always show blocked users](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10958), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10956 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10956), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:purple_heart: #10954 [Revert "upgrade shadow"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10954), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #10951 [Don't re-open bottom sheet if now closing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10951), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10950 [Disable by default list item animations on android](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10950), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10949 [Fix password position in wallet new account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10949), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

# COMMITS
Last week there were 17 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update translations  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4e5848ee6f2bc9c65645fc7c7611cc76afafc7a6) by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Disable by default list item animations on android  Use highlight for touchable feedback  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/923beb5f269cb16c7861abc0126ef40c7eab3f48) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10928] Always show blocked users](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/292df1439c9ad96fa30585280d134218039c99c8) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e for contact view  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/cd4b2110c6d1a595488a9c2521f78b05b5128538) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: fix conditional that selects .env.e2e for ABI=x86 builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9ce786c9fb79c51e38a59aac596b6da99fb7cda4) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10914] Show proper username in chat on opening from background](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/618b1f81e2835e5f6d07d02be7a429f018ec325a) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Don't re-open bottom sheet if now closing  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b7bc7c4e5d60c260a22439c20598bd81ee58bf7a) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix password position in wallet new account  Fixes #10921  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/fa4968f22c0d9c063ac07c6a34454f7241197a5b) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix missing i18n  fixes #10945  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0adc047f05d106a320d007fa67b80bad202fc72c) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Merge password screens  Update e2e  Small UX feedback changes  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5c051746046b9e3e7f709788ed3d522ec31c10f8) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Extend security masked data protocol](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/df9062475c456f62b3173dfe7ed7934faa7dc92d) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix scroll and key to locate eth  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f5675b640df67f1bbd0343d713b1c5397a9f966c) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e for separate keystore  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/cd04acde3adfebbcfab0e702b279c99b1bd8116d) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[keycard] Rename all "hardwallet" occurencies to "keycard"  Previously we used both "keycard" and "hardwallet" names for stuff related to keycard. It can be confusing as "hardwallet" might be used for other hardwallets in future.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/15cbec07e997c8309a9d24b8cb1d1d932644a74c) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Revert "upgrade shadow"  This reverts commit 08cbc7611109502134205e3619ca7f82e58769e8.  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/67ce4b03aa093d2df40e0d506c2264c0f9f84cf1) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [bump status-react-jenkins to 1.2.0  This updates a bunch of things in the Jenkins logic. For details of that see: https://github.com/status-im/status-react-jenkins/pull/12  It grew out of the changes I made to make PR builds available in Desktop client: https://github.com/status-im/nim-status-client/pull/507  Changes: - Bump `status-react-jenkins` library to newer version, probably `1.2.0` - Update use of `utils.pkgFilename()` in `ci/Jenkinsfile.combined` - Make all iOS builds go into the same folder: `status-ios` - Drop e2e build type, infer it from Android ABIs set to `x86` only - Simplify logic in `nix/mobile/android/release.nix.`  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/84286782f69cea7382eaaac261d056b64c998b7e) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Logcat grep, new templates e2e fix  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ba0ae149adc79be6bda6c835895bc77d1d43c856) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)

# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:

*You can also [view all Weekly Digests by clicking here](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues?q=is:open+is:issue+label:weekly-digest).*
